comment: Sample Log: 0.0.0.0,Enterprise OID: . Trap Type: Cold Start Trap Sub-Type: 0 Uptime: 0 Description: Cold Start PDU Attribute/Value Pair Array:DISMAN-EXPRESSION-MIB::sysUpTimeInstance = 3:3:14:14.63 SNMPv2-MIB::snmpTrapOID.0 = Barracuda-BWS::bws Barracuda-BWS::httpProxyTotalReq.ipv4."172.16.255.4".80 = 1186053
Description: Extract the value after port 80 (1194716 in the sample above) and set actionable if it drops below 100
The regex below (\d\d) would match on only 2 integers. Thus, a value if 1-99 would match but 100+ would not
